peril.views.slick.states

Class EndState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
      • peril.views.slick.states.InteractiveState
        • peril.views.slick.states.EndState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, org.newdawn.slick.state.GameState, Container

    public final class EndState
extends InteractiveState
    The final InteractiveState where the winner and losers are displayed.
    Since:
    2018-02-26
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    InteractiveState

      • podium

        private final java.util.LinkedList<SlickPlayer> podium
        The ordered SlickPlayers finishing positions. SlickPlayer at the front of the LinkedList is 1st place.

      • addToTop

        public void addToTop(SlickPlayer player)
        Adds a SlickPlayer to the top of the podium. If there is already players at the top they are moved one position down.
        Parameters:
        player - SlickPlayer
